about_the_game:
Pizza Bandit is a unique blend of Overcooked and Gears that offers a twist to the genre with its love for cooking. In this mission-based 4-player co-op third-person shooter, you embody a pizza restaurateur who returns to his old bounty-hunting gigs, determined to sustain his failing pizza shop.


Embark on a thrilling time-traveling adventure as a pizza shop owner returning to bounty hunting to save your failing business. Travel through different eras, capture bounties, and gain cooking experience to cater to your unique clientele.

It's all about the Roll


Your survival hinges on your masterful use of the roll to evade. You are an expert in this, allowing you to roll whatever you hold in any circumstances. Shoot and weave through your enemies and get the job done.

Adrenaline-Fueled Combat


Fast-paced battles demand quick reflexes and even quicker thinking as you roll, aim, and shoot in a seamless survival dance. You'll face faster and more aggressive enemies than typical shooters.

Cooking and Missions


Get ready to take on diverse missions that require sharp shooting and the ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously. You'll need to dodge relentless enemy attacks while accomplishing your goals through precise shooting and efficient task management. It's not just about firepower but also about strategy and skill.

Weapons and Skills


Make sure to pick out your loadout thoughtfully for every mission! Your skills are just as critical as your weapons. You can boost your weapons by finding different components during missions. Taking on bounty contracts will earn you extra rewards and unlock new weapons and skills, making your gameplay even more exciting!

Character Customization

Personalize your character with fashionable attire, vibrant accent colors, illuminating lights, hair, and skin tone. (Please note that body/facial morphing is not available).

1-4 Player Co-Op

Team up with friends or other players in a thrilling 1-4 player co-op mode. Mission difficulty adjusts to your squad size, but beware—sometimes your biggest challenge is coordinating with your allies. Friendly fire is allowed, adding another layer of tension and strategy. The quick-join option makes teaming up a breeze.
